img_text: 3-PHASES OF MUSLIM IMMIGRATION Phase 1 - Few in Number - Oppressed Islam Play the Victim Claim Islamophobia More Tolerant of Others Phase 2 Large Minority- Indignant Islam Threatening Demand Sharia Law Intolerant of Infidels Phase 3 Clear Majority- Dominant Islam Militant Strict Sharia Law Kill Subdue All infidels For 1400 Years This Pattern Hasn't Changed. Moderates Are Irrelevant.
